A musical theater production that follows the journey of a group of mice who discover their hidden talents and use their voices to save their home from destruction.
A children's book series that teaches the importance of teamwork and self-discovery through the adventures of a group of mice who each have their own unique singing abilities.
A social media campaign that encourages people to share their own singing talents and inspires others to do the same, with the goal of creating a global community of singers.
A video game that allows players to take on the role of a mouse who must use their singing abilities to navigate through different levels and overcome obstacles.

A virtual reality experience that transports users to a world where they can interact with mice who have the ability to sing and learn more about their musical talents and how they use them to solve problems.
